snippet: Boeing’s full-court press to address the risk of battery fire on its 787 Dreamliner jet earlier this year has not slowed progress on other planes still in development, a top Boeing executive said.
abstract: Boeing says its efforts to address risk of battery fire on its flagship 787 Dreamliner jet has not slowed progress on company's other planes in development, including revamped version of its popular 777 wide-body aircraft; acknowledges struggles to dispel lingering questions among passengers and pilots about whether measures taken to eliminate risks are sufficient.
lead_paragraph: Boeing’s full-court press to address the risk of battery fire on its 787 Dreamliner jet earlier this year has not slowed progress on other planes still in development, a top Boeing executive said.

headline.main: Boeing Moving Ahead on Making New Planes
headline.print_headline: Boeing Moving Ahead On Making New Planes
